message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is just too low for me.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will more than pay for itself. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I can only go up to $11,500. Can you consider this revised offer?
